Lines

Source: R/add.R

Add lines.

e_lines(e, source.lon, source.lat, target.lon, target.lat,
  coord.system = "geo", name = NULL, ...)

Arguments

e

An echarts4r object as returned by e_charts.
source.lon, source.lat, target.lon, target.lat

coordinates.
coord.system

Coordinate system to use, one of geo, or cartesian2D.
name

name of the serie.
...

Any other option to pass to bar or line char types.

Examples

flights <- read.csv(
  paste0("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/plotly/datasets/",
         "master/2011_february_aa_flight_paths.csv")
)

flights %>%
  e_charts() %>%
  e_geo() %>%
  e_lines(
    start_lon,
    start_lat,
    end_lon,
    end_lat,
    name = "flights",
    lineStyle = list(normal = list(curveness = 0.3))
   )
#> Error in yaml.load(readLines(con), error.label = error.label, ...): argument "error.label" is missing, with no default
